amendment.description: To authorize the purchase of aircraft for use in aerial firefighting.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3295 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3295 proposed by Senator Enzi. (consideration: CR S6711, S6721; text: CR S6711) To authorize the purchase of aircraft for use in aerial firefighting.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3295 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3295 proposed by Senator Enzi.
